llm_res.rule: transfer: Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
allowance function should return the remaining number of tokens that the spender will be allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.
totalSupply: Returns the total token supply.
balanceOf: Returns the account balance of another account with address _owner.
